name: Shock Tactics
description: Shock Tactics is a single player turn-based sci-fi strategy game with tactical combat, exploration, squad management and base building.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Q9650 / AMD Phenom II X4 940 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX660 / Radeon 7870 / 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 3,9 Ghz / AMD FX-8350 4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX770 / R9 290 / 4GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
